explains: vt. 调节；（信号）调制；调整

sentences.en: These chemicals modulate the effect of potassium.
sentences.cn: 这些化合物可以调节钾的功效。

sentences.en: A Transform operator can be used to modulate the result of the ForEach operation.
sentences.cn: 可以使用Transform操作符来调节ForEach操作的结果。

sentences.en: He won’t fix a blame for failure on something or someone, but will modulate himself to rectify the situation.
sentences.cn: 他不会为失败而责备其他人和事，而是调整自己去改变处境。
